column1: Topic title: Federal Territories BN Youth offers free fuel to

column8: http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/...-motorcyclists/Federal Territories BN Youth offers free fuel to motorcyclistsBernama | April 1, 2017The youth wing is allocating RM45,000 this month for its free petrol programme to motorcyclists in the federal capital, Putrajaya and Labuan.KUALA LUMPUR: The Federal Territory Barisan Nasional (BN) Youth wing is allocating RM45,000 this month for its free petrol programme to motorcyclists in the federal capital, Putrajaya and Labuan.Its chief, Mohd Razlan Rafii said the monthly programme, that began last month, was to ease the burden of motorcyclists.“We are targeting more than 8,000 motorcyclists for this free petrol programme to be carried out until the end of the year,” he told Bernama here today.Today, motorcyclists can refuel their machines for free at Petronas at Precinct 9, Putrajaya (from noon to 2pm); Petronas at Segambut (3pm-5pm); Shell at Batu Muda (3pm-5pm); Petronas at Taman Tenaga (3pm-5pm); and Caltex at Jln Tun Razak, Bukit Bintang (5pm-7pm).They can also refuel at Petron at Jalan Pasar (5pm-7pm); Petronas at Jalan Chohcrane (5pm-7pm); BHP at Taman City, Jln Kuching (6pm-8pm); Shell Kuchai (8pm-10pm); Petronas at Pasir Kiri, Jalan Taman Gasing (8pm-10pm); and Petronas at Saguking, Labuan (8pm-10 pm).The programme will be available at two locations tomorrow, namely BHP at Taman Ibu Kota, Wangsa Maju, from 4pm-6pm and Shell at Jalan Kilang Setiawangsa (8pm-10pm).
